input.sentences: mom and all 5 daughters on a road trip to the beach .
we stopped at the over look to get the great picture opportunity .
the beach was pretty crowded since it was a warm summer day .
the girls had a great time frolicking in the water .
we made a little beach area to get away from the crowded beach so we could relwax and watch the waves .
output.sentences: It was time for the family road trip.
The family loved to go everywhere together.
Their favorite place to go was the beach.
The water was cold the day they went to the beach but the kids didn't care.
The parents sunbathed while the kids played in the water.
